website_summaries.verdict: These welding sleeves offer a perfect combination of quality and affordability.
pros: Golden-brown leather construction ensures the sleeves can serve you well both now and in the future
Designed to provide a snug, comfortable fit for both men and women
Tend to last longer than cotton sleeves
cons: Fit may be too tight for some users
Elastic cuffs may break due to extended use

customer_reviews.title: tight but work great
customer_reviews.text: im far from a big guy but these start to dig into my biceps a bit when worn for a long time. other than that great sleeves with excellent protection from those horrible little spatter BB's from hell. wore them at my steel fab job for a while and theyre still holding strong with only slight damage to the stitching around the wrist elastic.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty short
customer_reviews.text: They're really short. I'm only 5'7" and they were too short for me. Leather is soft and flexible. Elastic to hold them up didnt seem very tight. I chose to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves were Just big enough for me, @ 5-10" 215#, but they seem to be just fine for welding, in combination with Lincoln Electric arc-welding gloves. Actually, they're nice and snug, which is better than falling-off loose. The elastic seems fine so far. Wife would like these also, for yard trimming...
customer_reviews.author: jimmymac

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Solution For Pruning Palm Trees
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect Solution For Pruning Palm Trees I'm using the sleeves to protect my arms from the sharp needle like thorns when I'm pruning our palm trees. The leather sleeves are absolutely dynamite for this application. I was concerned when I read some comments regarding the sleeves being too tight or small. On the contrary, I found them to fit perfectly. I'm 5'10" and medium build.
customer_reviews.author: camagic

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed a lot more inexpensive than in stores
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Wor For Me
customer_reviews.text: As I get older I find I cut and bleed very easily. These protect me particularly when pruning shrubbery.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorman

customer_reviews.title: Preventing bites and pinches
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use to prevent bird and pinches from kids at work. Send to work, I will update after I get punched out bitten. So far has been a deterrent
customer_reviews.author: dart

customer_reviews.title: Decent  but not quite long enough
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I bought a set about 8 months before this and weld everyday so was pleased with how long they held up. They are a bit short if you want them to come from your wrist up to you shoulder but they stop the sparks. After the first few days of wearing they stretch out enough to where they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott snow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT protection from sparks and weld burn! Much better than the cotton DR sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Dac

customer_reviews.title: Leather Welding Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy these for welding. I purchased them for cutting limbs and running them through a chipper. My arms would be scratched very bad. Now that I have these sleaves I don't have any problems with scratched arms. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: jonjon

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to use these for a while before rating them. I love these. No more burns. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Rajca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The elastic in the bands don't last long, mine broke after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The Guys Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and friends weld the big stuff and a factory, they needed great quality stuff to protect them and on our budgets. So, putting our money together I was able to purchase a few of these sleeves and they are a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Ray

customer_reviews.title: Protective gear
customer_reviews.text: These welding sleeves are easy to use. I once used heavier ones at work and had to tie and adjust and were sort of uncomfortable but these are great for light homework.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Took back 2 stars because they are too tight, ...
customer_reviews.text: Took back 2 stars because they are too tight, especially at the wrists. Can't wearthem for long without hurting your wrists unless you have very very small wrists.
customer_reviews.author: haidiepnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality and pretty much stay on your arm like they are supposed too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Little tight but comfortable, good leather and protects from welding sparks and grinding sparks should last long time.the end. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a girl 5'4" average weight. The sleeves fit me perfectly. This would not fit a beefy guy,
customer_reviews.author: Lala Bluestone

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. They are kind of short but I would ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They are kind of short but I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap and seem to be well made. But I hope you have girl arms because they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product to use when weather turns hot -- cooler than long sleeve shirts. recommend for any welder
customer_reviews.author: kegera matthews-lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Use it always
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and i use it all the time, i am a tig welder and these definately take out some of the fears of resting my bare arms.
customer_reviews.author: Aamir Quraishy

customer_reviews.title: Great arm protection
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. And, the price was right. Good quality, strong and durable. I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H. Felker Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've used all types of sleeves and by far these are the best I've used. Bar none. The price is good. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Roy K. Duve

customer_reviews.title: Using for cutting shrubs and protecting arms
customer_reviews.text: Double duty arm covers. Good for welding yet great protection for cutting shrubs and bushes. No blood spots on arms anymore when doing landscaping work.
customer_reviews.author: Herb J

product_meta.title: Welding Sleeves, Leather, Golden Brown, 18", Elastic Cuff, Heat Resistant
product_meta.description: Welding Sleeves, Leather, Golden Brown, 18, Elastic Cuff, Heat Resistant
